title: Hubbell Trading Post National Historic Site: Partners
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners            Partners       The goal of the Friends of Hubbell Trading Post NHS is to aid and promote the management of programs and objectives of the historic site.   Other goals include supporting Native American arts and crafts through our biannual Friends of Hubbell Native American Art Auction , providing scholarships to Navajo and Hopi college students, and to increase the awareness of the trading post heritage in the Southwest.
